author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Singapore GIC Sells Shares In CRCC High-Tech Equipment - HKEx Filing
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - CRCC High-Tech Equipment Corp Ltd :
* SINGAPORE GIC PTE LTD SELLS 117,000 H-SHARES OF CRCC HIGH-TECH EQUIPMENT AT AN AVERAGE PRICE PER SHARE OF HK$1.6015 ($0.2040) ON APRIL 13 - HKEX FILING
* SINGAPORE GIC PTE LTD OWNS 8.99 PERCENT STAKE IN CRCC HIGH-TECH EQUIPMENT AFTER THE TRANSACTION FROM 9.02 PERCENT PREVIOUSLY - HKEX FILING Source text in English: bit.ly/2JR3wsO Further company coverage: ($1 = 7.8499 Hong Kong dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
